name: The Prisoner: Last Escape
description:
University assignment to make a game based on the show The Prisoner

you are number 6, a man who wakes up to find himself in the Village, a nice little town where everyone is overly nice and every need accounted for, the only price being one's freedom, you are never allowed to leave.

after many unsuccessful attempts at quitting the village, Number 6 is given one last chance to escape or he will die. The Last Escape.

most assets were obtained via the UE4 marketplace for free, I modelled iconic props from the Prisoner show and the building modular assets.
